results.text: Extreme Ranged: Weapon Jam Your weapon does not function until you take a standard action to clear the jam.
Extreme Grenade: Pull Pin and Throw You threw the pin! The grenade detonates in your square.
Extreme Melee: Punt Your weapon flies 2d6 squares in a randomly determined direction.
Extreme Ranged: Off like a Rocket Your weapon flies 4d6 squares in the direction opposite your target.
Extreme Acid: The Goggles do Nothing! You take half weapon damage, and are dazzled until healed.
Extreme Melee: Alley-Oop! Your weapon flies 1d6 squares in a randomly determined direction.
Extreme Cold: Now I'm a Snowman! You are subjected to the slow spell (Fortitude negates; Core Rulebook 377).
Extreme Electricity: Short Circuit One randomly determined piece of technological equipment on your person stops working for 1d3 rounds.
Extreme Fire: Enlightened You gain the burning condition (1d4 fire damage per 2 levels).
Extreme Sonic: Do you hear that? You are deafened for 4d4 rounds.
Extreme Piercing: Nailed in Place You can't leave your space until you succeed at a strength check.
Extreme Grenade: Wind Took It Your grenade detonates 4d4 squares from you in a randomly determined direction.
Extreme Melee: Sword in the Stone Your weapon lodges in an adjacent surface, requiring a successful DC 20 Strength check to free it.
Extreme Ranged: Friendly Fire Isn't Reroll the attack against the ally closest to your original target, if the attack could normally target that ally.
Extreme Bludgeoning: Seeing Double You take half weapon damage, and your attacks have a 50% miss chance for 1d4 rounds.
Extreme Grenade: Cluster Buster You fling 1d3 randomly determined additional grenades (if you have them). Each grenade travels 1d6 squares in a randomly determined direction from you.
Extreme Melee: Hand it Over You are successfully disarmed by the target as if it had succeeded at a disarm combat maneuver against you.
Extreme Ranged: Stovepipe Your weapon jams and can't fire until cleared with a successful Engineering check (if a character fails by 5 or more, take the critical hit from the weapon).
Extreme Slashing: Gusher You gain the bleeding condition (1d4 damage per level).
Extreme Piercing: Run Through You take weapon damage.
Extreme Acid: Burning Sensation You take weapon damage and move 2 step down the Wisdom poison track (Core Rulebook 416) until healed.
Extreme Grenade: This Is Bad Your grenade is caught in your hair or equipment. You must succeed at a Dexterity check as a move action by the end of your next turn or it detonates in your square.
Extreme Melee: Fling! Your weapon flies 3d4 squares in a randomly determined direction.
Extreme Ranged: Don't Shoot Your Eye Out You must succeed at a Reflex save or be blinded for 1 round/level.
Extreme Cold: F-F-F-Frozen You can't speak until healed.
Extreme Electricity: Static Any technological communication device on your person does not work for 1d4 minutes.
Extreme Grenade: Blast Off! You are thrown 2d6 squares in a randomly determined direction. You take no damage but are knocked prone.
Extreme Melee: Butterfingers You drop all held items and can't recover them until your next turn.
Extreme Ranged: No Flash Suppressor You are blinded for 1 round.
Extreme Fire: Foomph A flash fire deal 1d6 fire damage per 2 levels or CR you have to all creatures in a 20-foot radius centered on you (Reflex half).
Extreme Sonic: Shriek Like A Wound Squox All foes gain a +1 bonus to attacks made against you for 1 round.
Extreme Bludgeoning: Smash Your Toe You take weapon damage and are knocked prone.
Extreme Grenade: Where There's Smoke Your grenade acts as a smoke grenade instead of applying it's normal effect, and goes off in your square.
Extreme Melee: Surprisingly Aerodynamic Your weapon flied 3d6 squares in a randomly determined direction.
Extreme Ranged: Dirt In The Muzzle Your weapon can't be used until it is cleared with a successful Engineering check.
Extreme Slashing: Bad Safety Protocol You can't make ranged attacks for 1d3 rounds.
Extreme Grenade: Juggling Act Of Doom You must succeed at a Sleight of Hand check as a move action on your next turn or your grenade detonates in your square.
Extreme Melee: It's A Ranged Weapon Now Your weapon flies 3d6 squares toward the nearest foe not adjacent to you. If the weapon reaches the opponent, you deal your unarmed damage to that foe.
Extreme Ranged: Blam, Blam, Blam, Toss Your weapon flies 5d6 squares toward your target. If the weapon reaches your target, make an unarmed attack against your target.
Extreme Piercing: My Foot! You take weapon damage, reduce your land speed by half until healed, and can't move from your space for 1d4 rounds.

Extreme Acid: Spectacular Splash You and all creatures within 30 feet take acid damage equal to the weapon's item level, the spell's caster level, or your character's level or CR. Use the highest value.
Extreme Grenade: Not What I Meant To Do! Your grenade is not expended. You instead throw one piece of randomly determined handheld equipment on your person 3d6 squares towards your target.
Extreme Melee: Choked Too Far Up Your weapon flies 2d4 squares in a randomly determined direction.
Extreme Ranged: Missed It By That Much You take a -2 penalty to ranged attacks against your target for 2d4 rounds.
Extreme Cold: Rime's The Reason You can't retrieve any equipment you are carrying on your person for 1d4 rounds, or until you take fire damage.
Extreme Electricity: Blame The Shag Carpet You and the creature nearest to you take half weapon damage.
Extreme Fire: Burning Soles You gain the burning condition (1d4 fire damage per 2 levels) and reduce your movement speeds by half until this burning ends.
Extreme Grenade: Here We Go! Your grenade lands next to your target without detonating, still ready to use.
Extreme Melee: Where Did It Go? Your weapons flies 1d6 squares in a randomly determined direction and can't be recovered without a successful DC 20 Perception check to notice it.
Extreme Ranged: Blew Your Finger Off You take a -4 penalty to all Dexterity-based ability and skill check until healed.
Extreme Sonic: Incredibly Loud Your failed attack is nearly as loud as thunder and can be heard up to 10 miles away.
Extreme Grenade: Bada Boom Your grenade lands 2d6 squares in a randomly determined direction from the target square, and it has triple the normal area.
Extreme Melee: Premature Flourish You sheath or put away your melee weapon, and you can't draw it until your next turn.
